en-US.title: Golff DAO Officially founded
en-US.description: Let the community power drive the development of Golff Finance

en-US.title: Golff Trading Mining Launch
en-US.description: Golff will launch LP trading mining on March 24, 2022 at 00:00 (GMT-4), in addition to increasing LP pool rewards on top of additional GOF to incentivize trading users

en-US.title: Golff Listed on Coinbase, Coinbase Wallet Now Supports GOF
en-US.description: Coinbase wallet now supports GOF and supports buying GOF with ETH.

en-US.title: Golff Christmas Event: Open the Mystery Box to Draw Limited Christmas NFT and GOF Rewards
en-US.description: Golff Finance is launching a special Christmas Mystery box drawing event.

en-US.title: Golff BSC Lend will launch DOT, UNI, FIL and other tokens
en-US.description: Golff Lend (BSC) will launch DOT, UNI, FIL, CAKE, AAVE, XVS on December 8, 2021 at 23:00 (GMT-4).

en-US.title: Golff Finance Launches BSC Lend
en-US.description: Golff Finance will re-launch the BSC Lend at 23:00 (GMT-4) on December 1, 2021, and support G-Token collateralized lending at the same time.

en-US.title: Heco lend G-Token adds G-USDC/G-BCH/G-MDX and other tokens
en-US.description: a new collateralized lending pool for G-USDC, G-MDX, G-DOT, G-UNI, G-FIL, and G-BCH at 22:00 (GMT-4) on November 25, 2021..

en-US.title: Golff Thanksgiving NFT Airdrop Event
en-US.description: Golff Finance would like to thank the community for support with the Golff Thanksgiving NFT Airdrop event on Twitter.

en-US.title: BSC Golff launches AAVE, ALPACA Vault and Farm mining pool
en-US.description: Golff BSC Vault adds tokens: AAVE, ALPACA.

en-US.title: Golff Roadmap V2 Official Launches
en-US.description: Golff Finance will start a new journey of route upgrade in the next yearâ€™s development route plan.

en-US.title: Support Golff Roadmap V2 to get 10,000 GOF airdrop reward
en-US.description: Golff Finance is launching the campaign Support Golff Roadmap V2 to get 10,000 GOF airdrop reward

en-US.title: Golff(BSC) launches CAKE Vault and Farm
en-US.description: Golff (BSC) will be newly launched on CAKE (based on Venus strategy) Vault

en-US.title: Announcement on Golffâ€™s removal of HLTC, HPT, TUSD Vaults and mining pools
en-US.description: Golff Finance has decided to removal the HLTC and HPT pools in the Heco Vault and to removal the G-HLTC and G-HPT mining pools in its Farm.

en-US.title: Golff Launches TribeOne (HAKA) Partnership Pool
en-US.description: Golff Carnival will launch TribeOne (HAKA) partner mining pool on November 1, 2021

en-US.title: Golff Launches Vault Voucher Mortgage Lending Strategy
en-US.description: Golff Launches The Worldâ€™s First Vault Voucher Mortgage Lending Strategy with Initial Support for Heco Lend

en-US.title: 99 Golff Limited Edition 1st Anniversary NFTs Will Release Soon
en-US.description: Golff 1st anniversary Pet-NFT is now officially launched

en-US.title: Gate.io has enabled GOF deposit and withdrawal on BSC
en-US.description: Gate.io exchange now has supportted for GOF deposit and withdrawal based on the BSC chain.

en-US.title: Announcement of Increasing GOF-BNB Pool Rewards and Removing Parts of LP Mining Pool
Golff Finance launched Golff Course
en-US.description: Golff Finance will launch the â€œCourseâ€ section with support for BSC and Heco at 20:00 (UTC+8) on September 22, 2021

en-US.title: BSC version of Golff Farm adds GOF-USDT mining pool
en-US.description: BSC version of Golff Farm will add GOF-USDT (BabySwap) mining pool on September 15, 2021 at 20:00 (UTC+8)

en-US.title: Golff and BabySwap become Mining partner
en-US.description: Golff and BabySwap have reached a strategic cooperation and both parties will start Farm mutual mining.

en-US.title: Golff 1st Anniversary Essay Contest
en-US.description: Golff is holding an essay contest in the global community, write an essay on the theme of "Golff's first anniversary.

en-US.title: Scope of application of this plan
en-US.description: For the sake of Golff's stable development and the safety of its users' assets, Golff is now launching a bug bounty program.

en-US.title: A Letter From US: Golff 1st Anniversary
en-US.description: This was quiet a year. Together we are going to celebrate our 1st Anniversary!

en-US.title: Golff Bridge Cross-chain Bridge New Launch
en-US.description: Golff Bridge cross-chain bridge will be officially launched on August 31, 2021 at 0:00 (GMT-4)
en-US.alt: Golff Bridge Cross-chain Bridge New Launch

en-US.title: Golff BSC Vault Pool Adds TUSD Token Pool and Simultaneously Supports Farm Mining Rewards
en-US.description: The Golff BSC Vault pool will add a new token pool of TUSD (stable coin) on August 27, 2021 at 11:00 (UTC+8) and launch the Farm mining bonus at the same time, welcome to participate.
en-US.alt: Golff BSC Vault Pool Adds TUSD Token Pool

en-US.title: Golff is listed on CertiK Skynet System with 94 security score
en-US.description: The One-Stop services Encrypted bank Golff Finance has been listed in the CertiK Skynet scanning system.
en-US.alt: Golff is listed on CertiK Skynet System with 94 security score
